Name: Mat the Rat
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Whether or not Mat was a rat, we shall never know. However, the drink that's named after him is long and thirst quenching.
History: A popular drink in UK branches of TGI Friday's where it was created.
Nutrition: One serving of Mat the Rat contains 181 calories
